thumb.name: Sweetest Blessings
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EPatty...%3Cbr%3EMay the road%3Cbr%3Eyou walk%3Cbr%3Ebe a smooth one.%3Cbr%3EMay your troubles%3Cbr%3Ebe few.%3Cbr%3Eif any.%3Cbr%3EMay the days%3Cbr%3Eand years%3Cbr%3Ethat lie ahead%3Cbr%3EBe healthy.%3Cbr%3Ehappy.%3Cbr%3Eand many...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay you find friends%3Cbr%3Ein abundance.%3Cbr%3EMay the sun shine bright%3Cbr%3Eabove you.%3Cbr%3EMay the world be%3Cbr%3Ea wonderful place to live.%3Cbr%3EMay you always have someone%3Cbr%3Eto love you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing You the Sweetest%3Cbr%3ESt. Patrick's Day Blessings

thumb.name: Best Day Ever
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You. Lee.%3Cbr%3Eon St. Patrick's Day%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay your joys be deep and many.%3Cbr%3EMay your heart be light and glad...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay you have%3Cbr%3Ethe best St. Patrick's Day%3Cbr%3EThat you have ever had!

thumb.name: Special People
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E'St. Patrick's Day%3Cbr%3Eis a special time%3Cbr%3Eto remember%3Cbr%3Especial people.'%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThinking of you. Edward.%3Cbr%3Eand wishing you%3Cbr%3Ea very happy St. Patrick's Day.
